content: **materials ** ▪ worsted weight yarn in black dark grey ▪ e hook 3 50 mm ▪ stuffing ▪ 9 mm safety eyes ▪ scissors ▪ tapestry needle **difficulty ** medium you should know how to work in the round increase and decrease final piece should measure approximately 7 tall this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2014-2016 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern
